overview: Japanese music sensation Babymetal opens their 2016 world tour at the SSE Arena, Wembley, London, England. This April 2, 2016 show made Babymetal the first Japanese band to headline at the Wembley Arena. In addition to their regular set, this concert included the live debut of their new songs GJ! and Amore.
tagline: Babymetal World Tour 2016 Kicks Off at the SSE Arena, Wembley
title: BABYMETAL - Live at Wembley
